row.entry: This module takes highlights, blurs them and then blends (screen blend lightness) with the original to create a soft blooms over the image, hence the name of the effect. There are numerous ways to use this module depending on the image's actual scenery lighting.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Starting from the default settings change the strength value for a pleasant look, then change the size to control the spread of light.

sect5.title: size
sect5.para: Represents the spatial extent of the bloom effect.

sect5.title: threshold
sect5.para: Set the threshold for the increase in brightness.

sect5.title: strength
sect5.para: Set the strength of overlightning for the effect.

row.entry: This is the original image, use it as reference for the changes below...
Here we have chosen to use a size of 10%, which is a rather small radius for the soft light spread. We boosted up the strength to 50% for a more exaggerated effect.
